data.description: A gallery of every artwork I could find from 2009-2003.
data.summary: I believe that younger artists deserve to view their inspirations' older artwork. After all, no one starts out perfect, so that's why this gallery is here!

pictures.title: Cat Got Your Tongue?
pictures.altText: A drawing of Sonic, Tails, and a cat biting on Tails's tongue.
pictures.caption: I believe I got the joke from a really funny Sunday comic, and I wanted to draw this with Sonic characters. I remember being so proud of manipulating the textures in such a way to make a decent background!

pictures.title: "I'm the Coolest"
pictures.altText: A drawing of Shadow the Hedgehog as a gijinka holding a Chaos Emerald.
pictures.caption: An attempt at a mixed media piece, using colored pencils and then adding a background in Photoshop. Apologies for the eye strain, I thought this looked cool as a young teen! xD If I remember correctly, this was a redesign of an older gijinka design I had for Shadow. I think I was 11 when I did this?

pictures.title: Another Emerald Thief
pictures.altText: An image of Shadow running away from an angry Knuckles as the former is holding the Master Emerald.
pictures.caption: This was one of the first few drawings I've colored digitally at the age of 10! I didn't quite learn how to use layers yet, but I was so proud of myself!

pictures.title: Anime Running on a Grass Field
pictures.altText: A drawing of Sonic running on a grassy field while his gijinka form appears as an apparition in the sky.
pictures.caption: This was one of the first few drawings I've colored digitally at the age of 10! I didn't quite learn how to use layers yet, but I was so proud of myself!
